mapper.sql: id, dictId, code, name, status, remark
mapper.insert: insert into t_loan_dict_dtl (dictId, code, name, status, remark) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_loan_dict_dtl
dictId,
code,
name,
status,
remark,
#{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_loan_dict_dtl
dictId = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_loan_dict_dtl set dictId = #{dictId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.* from t_loan_dict_dtl a,t_loan_dict b where a.dictId=b.id and b.status='T' and a.status='T' and b.code= #{code} order by a.dictId, a.code

update.foreach: update t_loan_dict_dtl set remark = #{cus.remark} where id = #{cus.id}
